subject: =?ISO-2022-JP?B?UmU6GyRCJDQzTkcnMjwkNSQkGyhC?=
body: Yet this was the man the impress of whose teaching has formed the national character of five hundred millions of people. A temple to Confucius stands to this day in every town and village of China. His precepts are committed to memory by every child from the tenderest age, and each year at the royal university at Pekin the Emperor holds a festival in honor of the illustrious teacher.
